patthana21.37:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.37:2.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.37:3.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.37:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.37:6.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
